name: Telefun
description:
It’s your first day on the job at the Sunset Valley Nursing Home. Your manager has asked you to help one of the residents with a banking issue before you go home. Can you navigate the bank’s automated menu system without getting stuck in a loop?

Each level has solutions that are randomly generated each time you start. All answers to the questions asked can be found inside the scene. Move and throw objects around the scene to find the information before time runs out and you’re sent back to the start.

LEFT CLICK to pick something up or dial numbers on the phone.
RIGHT CLICK to throw something that you’ve picked up.
MOUSE WHEEL  to move something that you’ve picked up closer or further away.
SHIFT + W,A,S, and D to rotate something that you’ve picked up.

Three songs were used that we did not create, all other sounds/audio were made by our team. 
1. Crab Rave by Noistorm
2. Opus No 1 by Tommy Dorsey
3. Brightest Day by Firstcom Music
